searchDocs.title: Database Export
searchDocs.keywords: database export dump backup json nitrite

searchDocs.title: Offline Exportâ€‹
searchDocs.content: info This command should only be used when the backend server is offline. Running this command while the backend server is running may not work as the database could be locked. To export the database while the backend server is running, use the API endpoint below.

searchDocs.title: Online Exportâ€‹
searchDocs.content: To export the database while the backend server is running, use the following API endpoint:  curl -X 'POST' 'http://localhost:1985/api/backendapi/command/database/database/export'

searchDocs.title: Launching dRAGonâ€‹
searchDocs.content: danger dRAGon lacks of authentication and authorization mechanisms. It is not recommended to expose it to the internet or unsafe networks. These mechanisms will be implemented in a near future.  ðŸš§Work In Progress This section lacks useful information. It is a work in progress and will be updated soon.
